WorkItem.ClosedComment:
I don't reproduce this, my guess is that there is an extension interfering with these options, like Resharper. 

Can you attach a list of installed extensions, and re-open when you added the info.
WorkItem.Description:
Seems these two option are not saved correctly. My steps as below:
1. Open the options dialog through "TOOLS" -> "Options".
2. Select the node "TypeScript" under "Text Editor", check these two options and click "OK" button.
3. It works well in the typescript editor. 
4. Restart VS. Those two options are not checked.
WorkItem.Summary: The "Auto list members" and "Parameter information" options for typescript are not saved in VS2013
